question: Testicular lymphatics drain into -
exp: Ans. is 'c' i. e., Para aortic lymph nods o Testicular lymphatics drain into paraaortic and prearotic group of lymph nodes at level of L2. o The lymphatics from the cervix drain into the external iliac, internal iliac and sacral nodes, o Lymphatic Drainage of uterus: Fundus and upper body - aortic nodes and superficial inguinal nodes. Lower body - external iliac nodes. Cervix - external iliac, internal iliac and sacral nodes, o Lymphatic drainage of Vagina: Upper 1/3 - external iliac nodes. Middle 1/3 - internal iliac nodes. Lower 1/3- superficial inguinal nodes. Organ. Draining Lymph node. Gians Penis & Clitoris. Rest of Penis. Deep inguinal nodes of cloquef. QSuperficial inguinal nodes. Testis and ovary. Post 1/3rd. Submental lymph nodes. Submandibular lymph nodes. Jugulo-omohyoid lymph nodes. All finally reach deep cervical lymph nodes. question: Lymphatic drainage of cervix -
exp: Ans. is 'c' i. e., External iliac o The lymphatics from the cervix drain into the external iliac, interna) iliac and sacral nodes. o Cervix (lower lymphatics) Lymphatics drain into external iliac, internal iliac, and sacral nodes, o Lower part of body (middle lymphatics):- Lymphatics drain into the external iliac nodes. o Fundus and upper part of body (upper lymphatics) Lymphatics drain mainly into para-aortic nodes and a few lymphatics from the uterine cornu accompany the round ligaments to reach the superficial inguinal nodes.
